categories: Category:Star Wars: The New Jedi Order

nodes.text: The New Jedi Order: Destiny's Way (audiobook)

The New Jedi Order: Destiny's Way is the abridged audio version of the Star Wars Legends novel of the same name, written by Walter Jon Williams. Destiny's Way is the fourteenth volume in The New Jedi Order novel series. The audiobook was performed by Jonathan Davis and was first released on compact disc on October 1, 2002. A downloadable edition was released on February 20, 2007.
